data.title: Handbook of Latin American Studies (HLAS): A Resource Guide
data.meta_description: Since 1936, HLAS has made scholarly research on Latin America more easily accessible by working with researchers to identify and describe books, journal articles, conference proceedings and papers, book chapters, maps and atlases, and electronic resources
